scripts.version: lerna version --no-push --yes && git tag -d $(git describe --abbrev=0) && git push
scripts.publish: lerna publish --yes --no-push && git push --tags && git push
scripts.deploy: git checkout -b release_master && git push -u && git checkout master && git push --delete origin release_master
scripts.local:publish: git checkout -b release_$(date +%s) && git push -u && npm run version
